GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix use after free in hci_send_acl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit d404765dffdbd8dcd14758695d0c96c52fb2e624. For more details please see the references link.
